Posts.Content: Jul 23, 2009 02:39AM MelanieRose wrote: Hi, Nancy, There is a nice selection of 38A bras at Figleaves.com (including some for post-surgery). You can do a search by bra size on the left side of the page. http://www.figleaves.com/us/department.asp?dept=bras&cm_re=menu-_-menu_bottom-_-bras The prices can be high, but they have a good inventory. Hope this helps! Melanie
